alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Inland Kenedy; Jim Hogg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 05 at 10:27PM CST until February 06 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 to 31 expected. * WHERE...Jim Hogg, Brooks and Inland Kenedy Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will damage cold sensitive crops and other sensitive vegetation. Frost is likely with high surface moisture content. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing temperatures are most likely in cold drainage and wind protected locations. Areas with a touch more wind, even at 5 mph, will likely stay between 34 and 37 degrees late tonight and early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Those that have in- ground sprinkler systems may wish to cover above-ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
